content.description: Start on the far right side of the boulder.  Under the bulge look for a large slot in a horizontal crack for your left hand and a small crimp up under the roof for the right hand.  Move up and right navigating some slopers.
content.location: Start on the far right side of the boulder.  Under the bulge look for a large slot in a horizontal crack

content.description: Starts just to the right of 'GKW'  Sit starts under the roof with the left hand on a small diagonal crimp and a right hand pinching the lip of the roof.  Make a move to the large flat hold in the horizontal seam above.  Continue up and top out just to the right of the GKW crack.
content.location: Starts just to the right of 'GKW'  Sit starts under the roof

content.description: Start compressed on the two lowest sections of the vertical cracks just to the right of ‘7 Year Itch’. Funky wide feet out right will help you make way to the right side pull and build up to the better edges above.
content.location: Left side of the estate, just to the right of ‘7 Year Itch’.

content.description: Starts just to the right of 'Estate of Affairs'.  Look for the large ledge just left of the roof void low on the boulder.  Start below the ledge undercling on the jug flake with low feet to press you in.  Make a move to gain the large ledge and move up and slightly right through the prominent vertical crack.
content.location: Starts just to the right of 'Estate of Affairs'.  Look for the large ledge just left of the roof void

content.description: The excellent line beginning in the bottom of the large curved iron rail at head height (above the vertical seam/crack). Start matched in the iron rail and trend up and right toward the big platform ledge, then top out with the huge jug rail further back from the flat lip.

Starts just to the right of Castle Black.  In the middle of the main face and  just left of the massive ledge inundation.  Start low with your left hand on a horizontal edge and right hand just below on a right diagonal crimp.  Moving out of the start and to the next sloper holds is the crux.  Continue straight up with some finesse for the top out.
content.location: Starts just to the right of Castle Black.  In the middle of the main face.

content.description: Sit start under the overhang below the arete (Right hand on the big brick undercling, left hand in the edge in the higher mouth/slot). Move up to the diagonal rail on the edge of the overhand, then link right into the big flat diagonal rail to the right. Finish as per the stand.

To the right of the main arete on the tall vertical face just right of the low overhang, find the big flat right facing diagonal rail above head height. Follow nice holds up the face to top where you'll find a large jug over the lip (left side of the small notch).

A much less good, dumpy low start to an otherwise fine and dandy standstart. Still yet, if not taken too seriously, this is a fun one.Sit start way low, compressing the left low flat side-pull above your heelhook on the ramp, right hand compressing the sloper. Toss high to the side-pull above, then gain the iron rail of the standstart to "Good Manors" to finish as per.
content.location: Estate, left side, right of Landscaper

content.description: Start Compressed with the left hand on the lowest section of the vertical crack and a right hand out on a side pull sloper. Make some compression moves to establish a toe for the precise dynamic move to an in-cut slot. Build feet and make another dynamic move up to a flat ledge to gain way for the top out.
content.location: Far left side of the Estate

content.description: Beautiful and Stately, this boulder sits above the river behind Croc Block and the Moat Block. Nice landings, tall faces and interesting holds.
